name: For SCIENCE!
description:
Build facilities and do SCIENCE!

This version has the new, improved tutorial. Let me know if you can follow it!

This is a fairly complex base-building game, and it's pretty early in development. I'd appreciate you giving it a try and telling me what your experience was like, so I can polish it.
